Hello all,

I was wondering--is there any way for the matlab interface to produce
an array of charges for each species within a phase?  There aren't
any apparent candidates in the toolbox, but I thought I'd check.

Much thanks,
Steven DeCaluwe

ps.  regarding my troubles with the 'display' function last week, the
issue still hasn't been solved.  I followed your instructions, Dr.
Goodwin, it worked in python, and I'm certain that it is accessing
the correct 'display' function in the matlab toolbox, but it still
produces no output.  I'm wondering if it could be some deleterious
effect of using matlab 6.1, versus a more current edition?  The
function isn't incredibly vital to my current modeling efforts, so
I'm not going to pursue it much further, but I thought I'd give an update.
